mentions.context: For the fine-tuning of the LMs, we employ the PyTorch implementation provided by Hugging Face [24].

We selected all-mpnet-base-v2 [23] as our baseline, and fine-tuned models such as BioBERT v1.2 [25], S-PubMedBert-MS-MARCO [26], and BioBERT-mnli-snli-scinli-scitail-mednli-stsb [27] as more domain-specific LMs under the same experimental setting.

We selected all-mpnet-base-v2 [23] as our baseline, and fine-tuned models such as BioBERT v1.2 [25], S-PubMedBert-MS-MARCO [26], and BioBERT-mnli-snli-scinli-scitail-mednli-stsb [27] as more domain-specific LMs under the same experimental setting.
